subject: Books and Literature
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In “7: The Mickey Mantle Novel,” Peter Golenbock has taken a calculated risk: that fans will want to hear fictional, profane, smutty and yet plausible stories about Mantle’s sex life.
snippet: In “7: The Mickey Mantle Novel,” Peter Golenbock has taken a calculated risk: that fans will want to hear fictional, profane, smutty and yet plausible stories about Mantle’s sex life.
